mapper.sql: a.qyid AS "qyid", a.userid AS "userid", a.qymc AS "qymc", a.zzjgdm AS "zzjgdm", a.yyzzzch AS "yyzzzch", a.khyh AS "khyh", a.yhzh AS "yhzh", a.sfsyq AS "sfsyq", a.gcjsry_zs AS "gcjsryZs", a.gcjsry_gjzcrs AS "gcjsryGjzcrs", a.gcjsry_zjzcrs AS "gcjsryZjzcrs", a.sylxid AS "sylxid", a.sylx AS "sylx", a.provinceid AS "provinceid", a.province AS "province", a.cityid AS "cityid", a.city AS "city", a.countyid AS "countyid", a.county AS "county", a.zcdd AS "zcdd", a.jjxzid AS "jjxzid", a.jjxz AS "jjxz", a.zczb AS "zczb", a.zyfw AS "zyfw", a.jyfw AS "jyfw", a.clrq AS "clrq", a.qyjj AS "qyjj", a.xxdd AS "xxdd", a.yzbm AS "yzbm", a.cz AS "cz", a.email AS "email", a.webaddress AS "webaddress", a.lxr AS "lxr", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.fddbr_ryid AS "fddbrRyid", a.fddbr AS "fddbr", a.qyfzr_ryid AS "qyfzrRyid", a.qyfzr AS "qyfzr", a.cwfzr_ryid AS "cwfzrRyid", a.cwfzr AS "cwfzr", a.jsfzr_ryid AS "jsfzrRyid", a.jsfzr AS "jsfzr", a.aqfzr_ryid AS "aqfzrRyid", a.aqfzr AS "aqfzr", a.datastate AS "datastate", a.tag AS "tag", a.xgr AS "xgr", a.xgrqsj AS "xgrqsj", a.xmjlzs AS "xmjlzs", a.aqy AS "aqy", a.zjy AS "zjy", a.sgy AS "sgy", a.tyshxydm AS "tyshxydm", a.needupdateflag AS "needupdateflag", b.url AS "photo", u.LoginPassword AS "loginPassword"
LEFT JOIN WJSJZX.dbo.corp_cert_attach b ON a.qyID = b.zzjgdm and b.cert_type=1 LEFT JOIN [WJSJZX].[dbo].[g_User] u ON u.LoginName = a.tyshxydm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WJSJZX.dbo.uepp_qyjbxx( qyid, userid, qymc, zzjgdm, yyzzzch, khyh, yhzh, sfsyq, gcjsry_zs, gcjsry_gjzcrs, gcjsry_zjzcrs, sylxid, sylx, provinceid, province, cityid, city, countyid, county, zcdd, jjxzid, jjxz, zczb, zyfw, jyfw, clrq, qyjj, xxdd, yzbm, cz, email, webaddress, lxr, lxdh, fddbr_ryid, fddbr, qyfzr_ryid, qyfzr, cwfzr_ryid, cwfzr, jsfzr_ryid, jsfzr, aqfzr_ryid, aqfzr, datastate, tag, xgr, xgrqsj, xmjlzs, aqy, zjy, sgy, tyshxydm, needupdateflag ) VALUES ( #{qyid}, #{userid}, #{qymc}, #{zzjgdm}, #{yyzzzch}, #{khyh}, #{yhzh}, #{sfsyq}, #{gcjsryZs}, #{gcjsryGjzcrs}, #{gcjsryZjzcrs}, #{sylxid}, #{sylx}, #{provinceid}, #{province}, #{cityid}, #{city}, #{countyid}, #{county}, #{zcdd}, #{jjxzid}, #{jjxz}, #{zczb}, #{zyfw}, #{jyfw}, #{clrq}, #{qyjj}, #{xxdd}, #{yzbm}, #{cz}, #{email}, #{webaddress}, #{lxr}, #{lxdh}, #{fddbrRyid}, #{fddbr}, #{qyfzrRyid}, #{qyfzr}, #{cwfzrRyid}, #{cwfzr}, #{jsfzrRyid}, #{jsfzr}, #{aqfzrRyid}, #{aqfzr}, #{datastate}, #{tag}, #{xgr}, #{xgrqsj}, #{xmjlzs}, #{aqy}, #{zjy}, #{sgy}, #{tyshxydm}, #{needupdateflag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE WJSJZX.dbo.uepp_qyjbxx SET qyid = #{qyid}, userid = #{userid}, qymc = #{qymc}, zzjgdm = #{zzjgdm}, yyzzzch = #{yyzzzch}, khyh = #{khyh}, yhzh = #{yhzh}, sfsyq = #{sfsyq}, gcjsry_zs = #{gcjsryZs}, gcjsry_gjzcrs = #{gcjsryGjzcrs}, gcjsry_zjzcrs = #{gcjsryZjzcrs}, sylxid = #{sylxid}, sylx = #{sylx}, provinceid = #{provinceid}, province = #{province}, cityid = #{cityid}, city = #{city}, countyid = #{countyid}, county = #{county}, zcdd = #{zcdd}, jjxzid = #{jjxzid}, jjxz = #{jjxz}, zczb = #{zczb}, zyfw = #{zyfw}, jyfw = #{jyfw}, clrq = #{clrq}, qyjj = #{qyjj}, xxdd = #{xxdd}, yzbm = #{yzbm}, cz = #{cz}, email = #{email}, webaddress = #{webaddress}, lxr = #{lxr}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, fddbr_ryid = #{fddbrRyid}, fddbr = #{fddbr}, qyfzr_ryid = #{qyfzrRyid}, qyfzr = #{qyfzr}, cwfzr_ryid = #{cwfzrRyid}, cwfzr = #{cwfzr}, jsfzr_ryid = #{jsfzrRyid}, jsfzr = #{jsfzr}, aqfzr_ryid = #{aqfzrRyid}, aqfzr = #{aqfzr}, datastate = #{datastate}, tag = #{tag}, xgr = #{xgr}, xgrqsj = #{xgrqsj}, xmjlzs = #{xmjlzs}, aqy = #{aqy}, zjy = #{zjy}, sgy = #{sgy}, tyshxydm = #{tyshxydm}, needupdateflag = #{needupdateflag} WHERE qyid = #{qyid}
UPDATE WJSJZX.dbo.uepp_qyjbxx SET qymc = #{qymc}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, county = #{county}, zcdd = #{zcdd} WHERE qyid = #{qyid}
